statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 25;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_history->'$.total_purchases' > 5 ORDER BY last_interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, gender FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.*, p.purchase_date, p.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 100 ORDER BY p.amount DESC;
SELECT p.product_id, p.purchase_date, c.name as customer_name, c.age FROM purchases p LEFT JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.age IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customers.name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customers.customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductData WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, registration_date FROM CustomerData ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, payment_method FROM OrderData WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductData WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, registration_date FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, category, price, stock_quantity FROM ProductData WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, age, location, education_level FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id AS ID, recommended_product AS Product FROM recommendations;
